Name: Better Hands
Description: Mod for H3VR to recolor controller geo, resize interaction spheres, and add mag palming. All features are optional and configured via deli/configs/betterhands.cfg. Configs can be edited mid-game, but will require a scene reload to take effect. Mag palming allows you to carry two small sized magazines in one hand. To do this click the trigger when holding a magazine in your hand.
ShortDescription: A few QoL improvements for your hands
